mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consultReservation(user_id, consult_date, create_date) VALUES(#{userId}, #{consultDate} , NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT cr.consultReservation_no consultReservationNo, cr.user_id userId, m2.member_name userName, cr.consult_date consultDate, m.member_name memberName, c.consult_content consultContent FROM consultReservation cr left JOIN consult c ON cr.consultReservation_no = c.consultReservation_no left JOIN employee e ON e.member_id = c.employee_id left JOIN member m ON e.member_id = m.member_id JOIN member m2 ON cr.user_id = m2.member_id WHERE cr.user_id = #{userId}
